indicator_name: 최빈개도국과 개도국으로부터의 수입에 적용되는 무관세 비율
target_name: 세계무역기구(WTO)협약에 따른 개도국(특히, 최빈개도국) 특별대우 규정 이행

en.title: Proportion of tariff lines applied to imports from least developed countries and developing countries with zero-tariff
en.graph_title: Proportion of tariff lines applied to imports with zero-tariff
en.indicator_name: Proportion of tariff lines applied to imports from least developed countries and developing countries with zero-tariff
en.national_indicator_description: Proportion of total number of tariff lines (in per cent) applied to products imported from least developed countries and developing countries corresponding to a 0% tariff rate
en.target: Implement the principle of special and differential treatment for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, in accordance with World Trade Organization agreements
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 564kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
